com.spire.pdf.barcode
Class PdfBarcode

java.lang.Object
  com.spire.pdf.barcode.PdfBarcode
Direct Known Subclasses:
PdfUnidimensionalBarcode
public class PdfBarcode
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a base class for all barcode types.
